snippet: The World Trade Organization reached its first trade reform deal on Saturday, a make-or-break agreement which could add $1 trillion to the global economy.
abstract: World Trade Organization reaches its first trade reform deal after Cuba backs off from threat to veto package of measures which could add $1 trillion to global economy.
lead_paragraph: The World Trade Organization reached its first trade reform deal on Saturday, a make-or-break agreement which could add $1 trillion to the global economy.

headline.main: W.T.O. Reaches First Global Trade Deal
headline.print_headline: W.T.O. Reaches First Global Trade Deal
